cause.description:
KWMR is non-commercial, community radio, offering a wide range of information and entertainment from our studios at The Creamery Building overlooking downtown Point Reyes Station, California.
1. Community radio is a vital resource
2. We're a community.
3. We need a radio station that serves our needs and brings us together.
cause.mission: inform West Marin and provide information in case of emergencies
cause.name: KWMR Community Radio
